3: If we hadn't found you on the road, you would have already been dead.
She's still alive, right? I can still see Luna... right?
She has already been processed and disposed of...
Disposed of... what does that mean?
In the last stage of the experiment, an immensely strong Punishing Virus reaction appeared inside her—it took over and corrupted her almost instantly.
Which means that Luna became a Corrupted. We had to dispose of her.
I'm sorry, but you'll never see her again.
If the experiment succeeds, they can all undertake defense missions in this area and protect everyone.
I'll leave the plushie to you.
When I become a Construct and have to be somewhere else, you can sleep with the plushie as if it were me.
It's about time, children. Let's go.
Lucia... I don't want to part with you...
But you've been protecting me all this time... You've done so much for me...
Now's my turn to protect you.
